episodes.title: Episode 3.1
episodes.description: Concerned about his health and legacy, Alfred sends Uhtred to confront a new threat: the fierce Danish warrior Bloodhair and his sorceress, Skade.

episodes.title: Episode 3.2
episodes.description: Falling out of favor with Alfred, Uhtred flees north to his brother, Ragnar. Æthelwold, eyeing the throne, begins assembling an alliance to strike Wessex.

episodes.title: Episode 3.3
episodes.description: Bloodhair and Æthelwold attempt to coax Uhtred into their alliance against Alfred. Fearing for her life, Æthelflæd turns to Father Beocca for aid.

episodes.title: Episode 3.4
episodes.description: Uhtred focuses on Æthelflæd's plight. Alfred forces Edward to face his duty. Ragnar's army marches, but traitors emerge from within.

episodes.title: Episode 3.5
episodes.description: A deadly betrayal threatens to splinter Ragnar's army. Uhtred devises a cunning battle plan and finds an unexpected ally in young Edward.

episodes.title: Episode 3.6
episodes.description: Edward makes a kingly decision. Alfred plans for his son's future reign. Æthelwold faces a treacherous task. Uhtred and Brida seek out a seer.

episodes.title: Episode 3.7
episodes.description: A message from Uhtred and Skade's machinations exploit divisions among the Danes. Alfred, with failing health, wrestles with Æthelwold's fate.

episodes.title: Episode 3.8
episodes.description: Uhtred risks returning to Wessex to fulfill his vow to Brida. As the royal wedding approaches, Æthelwold spreads discord from the shadows.

episodes.title: Episode 3.9
episodes.description: At the end of his days, Alfred confides in Uhtred about his plans for Edward's uncertain future, but Ælswith charts a different course.

episodes.title: Episode 3.10
episodes.description: As a climactic battle with the Danes looms, untested Edward faces dire decisions about the fates of Uhtred, Wessex, and England.
